meanings.definition: In a manner that is true to nature or reality.
meanings.sent1: She painted the landscape naturalistically, capturing every detail of the trees and sky.
meanings.sent2: The artist depicted the scene naturalistically, making it look just like the real thing.
meanings.sent3: The actor tried to act naturalistically, but ended up overdoing it and making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her photographs were so naturalistically beautiful, they seemed to come to life.
meanings.sent5: The author described the setting so naturalistically that readers felt like they were there.

meanings.definition: In a way that imitates or represents nature accurately.
meanings.sent1: The special effects in the movie recreated the explosions naturalistically.
meanings.sent2: The costume designer crafted the outfits naturalistically, using real materials and textures.
meanings.sent3: The robot moved naturalistically, mimicking human gestures with precision.
meanings.sent4: The sound effects in the game were so naturalistically done, players felt fully immersed.
meanings.sent5: The CGI in the film was done so naturalistically that it was hard to distinguish from reality.
